name: Towards the Light (Erik Prinz)
description:
Towards the Light is an experimental Puzzle-Platformer that explores all the new and unusual facets that the afterlife has to offer. You play as a ghost navigating a mysterious mansion in an attempt to understand both who and where you are. You'll be faced with challenges involving light manipulation, precision platforming and timing.

Towards the Light was created by Erik Prinz as a second year game design project over the span of 4 weeks. It's still rough around the edges, with somewhat cringey voice acting and writing - but these things just leave room for the project to grow.
